trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemDataBind"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemDataBind"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: When you create an ObjectListDataBindEventHandler delegate for an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 ObjectListDataBindEventHandler 委派<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>，必須識別處理事件的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> notifies the handler when an item event is generated (after data binding).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>時 （當資料繫結） 之後產生的項目事件通知的處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: You can use this handler to do complex data binding and to set values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行複雜資料繫結，並設定中的值，您可以使用這個處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItem>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItem>
